titleStmt.title: Cunctis Christi, Apostolorum sanctorumque verba docentibus & profitentibus To all the professors & teachers of Christs words, and the apostles and saints / authore G.F.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Text in Latin followed by an English translation.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
